name: Valentine Afro Rock Vs The Sign Maker
name_original: Valentine Afro Rock Vs The Sign Maker
description:
You play as Valentine Afro Rock, you must find all the keys in the level to reach the end. There are stupid enemies and pitfalls everywhere. 

This was the first game I ever created and it was for college. It's full of spelling mistakes and unfair gameplay and in 6 years I've still not managed to create anything as beautiful as this game.
